subject: Basketball
Royal Family
lead_paragraph: Kyle Korver and Paul Millsap each scored 17 points, and Atlanta beat the Philadelphia 76ers, 95-79, giving the Hawks their longest winning streak in 17 years.
snippet: Kyle Korver and Paul Millsap each scored 17 points, and Atlanta beat the Philadelphia 76ers, 95-79, giving the Hawks their longest winning streak in 17 years.
